name: Corsair K70 RGB PRO Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
description: Cherry MX mechanical switches with per-key RGB backlighting and a durable aluminum frame. Features dedicated media controls, 8MB onboard storage for profiles, and ICUE software integration for full customization.

name: Razer BlackWidow V4 75% Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
description: Compact 75% layout with Razer's Orange tactile mechanical switches and a built-in OLED display. Hot-swappable switches and full Chroma RGB make it ideal for gaming and streaming setups.

name: Logitech G502 X PLUS Wireless Gaming Mouse
description: LIGHTFORCE hybrid optical-mechanical switches deliver incredible speed and reliability. Features HERO 25K sensor, LIGHTSPEED wireless, and LIGHTSYNC RGB with 13 programmable controls.

name: Razer DeathAdder V3 Wired Gaming Mouse
description: Ultra-lightweight 59g ergonomic gaming mouse with Focus Pro 30K optical sensor. Features optical switches Gen-3, 8K Hz HyperPolling support, and Speedflex cable for zero-drag movement.

name: Razer DeathAdder Essential Gaming Mouse
description: Budget-friendly ergonomic gaming mouse with 6400 DPI optical sensor and 5 programmable buttons. Classic ergonomic shape trusted by millions of gamers worldwide at an unbeatable price.

name: SteelSeries Arctis Nova 7 Wireless Gaming Headset
description: Multi-platform wireless headset with simultaneous 2.4GHz and Bluetooth connectivity. Features custom-tuned 40mm drivers, ClearCast Gen 2 AI-powered noise-cancelling mic, and 38-hour battery life.

name: HyperX Cloud III Wired Gaming Headset
description: Angled 53mm drivers with DTS Spatial Audio deliver immersive gaming sound. Memory foam earcups, durable aluminum frame, and detachable noise-cancelling mic make it perfect for marathon sessions.

name: LG 27GP850-B 27" QHD Nano IPS Gaming Monitor
description: 27-inch QHD (2560x1440) Nano IPS display with 165Hz refresh rate and 1ms response time. Features NVIDIA G-SYNC Compatible, HDR 400, and wide color gamut for stunning visuals.

name: ASUS VG248QG 24" Full HD Gaming Monitor
description: 24-inch 1080p TN panel with blazing 165Hz refresh rate and 0.5ms response time. G-SYNC Compatible with ergonomic stand for tilt, swivel, pivot, and height adjustment.

name: Secretlab Titan Evo Gaming Chair
description: Award-winning ergonomic gaming chair with 4D armrests, magnetic head pillow, and 4-way lumbar support. Premium leatherette upholstery with cold-cure foam for all-day comfort during gaming or work.

name: Xbox Core Wireless Controller
description: Updated Xbox wireless controller with textured grip and hybrid D-pad. Works seamlessly with Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Windows PC, and mobile devices via Bluetooth.

name: Keychron Q1 Pro Wireless Mechanical Keyboard
description: Premium QMK/VIA-compatible wireless mechanical keyboard with full aluminum CNC body. Hot-swappable Gateron Jupiter switches, gasket mount design, and triple-mode connectivity (BT/2.4GHz/USB-C).

name: Logitech MX Mechanical Mini Wireless Keyboard
description: Low-profile mechanical keys with smart backlighting that adapts to lighting conditions. Multi-device connectivity via Bluetooth and Logi Bolt, with Easy-Switch for up to 3 devices.

name: LG 34WN80C-B 34" UltraWide WQHD IPS Monitor

description: 18-port Thunderbolt 4 docking station with 98W charging, dual 4K display support, and 2.5GbE ethernet. The gold standard for developer and creative workstation connectivity.

name: Logitech C920x HD Pro Webcam
description: Full HD 1080p webcam at 30fps with stereo audio and automatic light correction. The industry-standard webcam for video calls, streaming, and remote work. Works with all major platforms.

name: Logitech Brio 4K Ultra HD Webcam
description: 4K Ultra HD webcam with HDR, Windows Hello support, and RightLight 3 auto-adjustment. 5x digital zoom and 90Â° field of view make it the premium choice for professionals.

name: Logitech MX Master 3S Wireless Mouse
description: Ergonomic wireless mouse with MagSpeed electromagnetic scroll wheel and 8K DPI tracking on any surface. Quiet clicks, USB-C quick charging, and multi-device flow across 3 computers.

name: Blue Yeti USB Microphone
description: Legendary USB condenser microphone with four pickup patterns (cardioid, bidirectional, omnidirectional, stereo). Studio-quality recording for streaming, podcasting, and voice-over work.

name: Shure MV7 USB/XLR Dynamic Microphone

name: HyperX QuadCast S USB Microphone
description: RGB USB condenser mic with dynamic lighting effects and tap-to-mute sensor. Four selectable polar patterns, built-in anti-vibration shock mount, and pop filter for broadcast-ready audio.

name: Elgato HD60 X Capture Card
description: External capture card with 4K30 passthrough and 1080p60 HDR10 capture. Ultra-low latency, USB 3.0 connectivity, and works with OBS, Streamlabs, and all major streaming software.

name: Elgato Stream Deck MK.2
description: 15 customizable LCD keys for one-touch control of apps, streaming, and smart home devices. Detachable USB-C, interchangeable faceplates, and deep integration with OBS, Twitch, and Spotify.

name: Elgato Stream Deck + Audio Mixer & Controller
description: Next-gen stream controller with LCD keys, touch-sensitive dials, and a touch strip. Functions as an audio mixer, production console, and studio controller with Wave Link integration.

name: Elgato Ring Light
description: Premium desk-mounted ring light with 2500 lumens and adjustable color temperature (2900-7000K). Edge-lit design eliminates glare in glasses, app-controlled via Elgato Control Center.

name: Neewer 18" RGB Ring Light Kit
description: 18-inch RGB LED ring light with adjustable tripod stand and phone holder. 16 million color options, dimmable 3200-5600K white light, and remote control for streaming and content creation.

name: Elgato Cam Link 4K
description: Compact HDMI to USB 3.0 capture device that turns any DSLR or camcorder into a webcam. Supports up to 4K30 capture with ultra-low latency for professional-quality streaming.

name: Sony ZV-1F Vlog Camera
description: Ultra-wide 20mm lens vlogging camera with background defocus, product showcase mode, and directional 3-capsule microphone. 4K video, flip screen, and USB streaming capability.

name: Logitech StreamCam Plus Webcam
description: Full HD 1080p at 60fps USB-C webcam with AI-powered face tracking and auto-exposure. Smart auto-framing, vertical video support, and built-in mounting for streaming and content creation.

name: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 Super Founders Edition
description: 12GB GDDR6X GPU with Ada Lovelace architecture delivering exceptional AI and ray tracing performance. DLSS 3.5 with Frame Generation, ideal for local AI model training and inference.

description: The flagship consumer GPU with 24GB GDDR6X VRAM and 16,384 CUDA cores. Unmatched for local LLM inference, AI model training, and deep learning research with DLSS 3 and AV1 encoding.

name: ASUS ProArt RTX 4060 Ti 16GB
description: 16GB VRAM version optimized for creative and AI workloads. ProArt design with enhanced cooling, Studio drivers support, and enough memory for medium-sized model fine-tuning.

name: Noctua NH-D15 CPU Cooler

name: NVIDIA Jetson Orin Nano Developer Kit

name: Raspberry Pi 5 Board (4GB)

name: ELEGOO Arduino Uno R3 Super Starter Kit

name: ELEGOO Arduino Mega 2560 Starter Kit

name: Creality Ender-3 V3 SE 3D Printer

name: Echo Dot (5th Gen) Smart Speaker

name: TP-Link Tapo Smart Plug Mini (4-Pack)

name: SanDisk 1TB Extreme Portable SSD
